headerDisplay: Doorbirds are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories and each needs to be manually paired. 1. Open the Home app on your device. 2. Tap the Home tab, then tap . 3. Tap *Add Accessory*, and select *I Don't Have a Code or Cannot Scan*. 4. Enter the Homebridge PIN, this can be found under the QR code in Homebridge UI or your Homebridge logs, alternatively you can select *Use Camera* and scan the QR code again. For help and examples of common configurations please read the [wiki](https://github.com/KhaosT/homebridge-camera-ffmpeg/wiki).
footerDisplay:
The **ffmpeg** binary must be installed on your system for this plugin to work.
For audio support, make sure your version of ffmpeg is compiled with support for **fdk-aac**.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name you want to assign to the Doorbird platform plugin. Default: Doorbird

videoProcessor.title: Video Processor
videoProcessor.description: Path to ffmpeg or your preferred video processor.

audio.title: Enable Audio
audio.description: Enable audio support for all configured Doorbirds. This requires a version of ffmpeg compiled with libfdk-aac. Default: false

debug.title: Plugin Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable debug mode for the plugin. Default: false

cmdDoorbell.title: Doorbell Command
cmdDoorbell.description: Command line to execute when a doorbell event is detected.

cmdMotion.title: Motion Command
cmdMotion.description: Command line to execute when a motion event is detected.

primaryRelay.title: Primary Relay
primaryRelay.description: Primary relay to trigger for doorbell lock events. Default: 1

source.title: Video Source
source.description: URL to use as the video stream source for FFmpeg.

stillImageSource.title: Image Source
stillImageSource.description: URL to use as the snapshot images for FFmpeg.

additionalCommandline.title: Additional command line options to pass to ffmpeg
additionalCommandline.description: Additional command line options to use with FFmpeg, for example '-loglevel verbose'.

maxStreams.title: Maximum Streams
maxStreams.description: The maximum number of streams that will be generated for this camera. Default: 4

maxWidth.title: Maximum Width
maxWidth.description: The maximum width reported to HomeKit. Default: 1280

maxHeight.title: Maximum Height
maxHeight.description: The maximum height reported to HomeKit. Default: 720

maxFPS.title: Maximum FPS
maxFPS.description: The maximum frame rate of the stream. Default: 15

packetSize.title: Packet Size
packetSize.description: Packet size to use for streaming. Must be in multiples of 188. Default: 376

debug.title: Video Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable video debugging for this Doorbird. Default: false
